name: Caffeine Rush (ExcaliburLily)
description:
Game Description
You play as Geoff, who wants to travel as far as he can in 60 seconds. Your aim is to get him enough of a caffeine rush to keep him moving without getting a caffeine overdose (from too much coffee) or extreme fatigue (from too little coffee).

Game Instructions
Press the Space key to jump. Hold Space key for longer to get a higher jump.

The game ends when 1 minute has passed or Geoff has either a caffeine overdose or extreme fatigue. When it is game over, press R to restart the game.

Comments
This game was made for Trijam #120. It is my very first game for a game jam. I spent 5 hours producing it and just wanted to experience a game jam rather than heavily focus on the 3 hour time constraint.

Credits
All sprites are drawn by me and sprite backgrounds were made transparent using remove.bg
Audio used is royalty-free and was composed by Heiko Klüh - https://www.proudmusiclibrary.com/en/track/melodee-1
